Package curam.util.security

Provides the classes and interfaces for the Curam's security framework

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authentication
    EJB Local server side Authentication interface, for use by a client outside the JVM of server.
    AuthenticationBase
    The base interface for server side remote and local interfaces to extend.
    AuthenticationLocal
    EJB Local server side Authentication interface, for use by a client within the same JVM as server.
    CustomAuthenticator
    Interface for implementing custom authentication verifications.
    ExternalAccessSecurity
    Interface for implementing external access security.
    SecurityCacheFailureCallback
    This callback interface allows some custom application functionality to be invoked when a failure occurs loading the security cache.
    UserScope
    UserScope interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authorisation
    The Authorization class provides the application with access to the Security Identifier elements that are necessary for the application to build it's own authorization on top of that offered by the infrastructure.
    JWTToken
    Class to handle functionality for JWT access tokens.
    PublicAccessUser
    Abstract Implementation for all external access security.
    SecurityProviderUtil
    A Class for creating Crypto related generic objects, using default provider available or using FIPS enabled Provider.
    UserLoginDetails
    The user details required for the client to complete the login.
    UserScopeFactory
    UserScopeFactory is used to instantiate an implementation of UserScope.

Package curam.util.security Description

Provides the classes and interfaces for the Curam's security framework.
Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
